snippet: Won Sei-hoon, who served as director of the National Intelligence Service, is the latest in a series of former spy chiefs who have faced criminal indictments after leaving office.
abstract: Won Sei-hoon, who served as South Korea's director of National Intelligence Service, is latest in series of former spy chiefs who have tarnished agency by facing criminal indictments after leaving office.
lead_paragraph: Won Sei-hoon, who served as director of the National Intelligence Service, is the latest in a series of former spy chiefs who have faced criminal indictments after leaving office.

headline.main: Former South Korean Spy Chief Charged With Bribery
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Ex-Spy Chief Is Held
